document_data.name: Hammergate
document_data.area: [[East Rift]], [[South Faerûn]]{{Cite digital book/The Gilded Rune/Kindle|767}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Hammergate''' was a town just outside the walls of [[Eartheart]] and was home to many [[human]]s.
document_data.Relationships: The town functioned as the foreign quarter of Eartheart.
